actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the maintenance of an export assistance office in Nothern California.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the Secretary of Commerce to establish an export assistance office in northern California. Requires the Secretary to include in a specified annual report a detailed accounting of all regional, district, and field offices' activities with respect to such assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the maintenance of an export assistance office in Nothern California.
